sentence.Network_en: Far as the eye extends, all are becoming golden from bice in the prostemmatic cornfield.
sentence.Network_cn: 遥至双眸再无延伸之处, 麦田地里的一切都正在经由绿色变成黄.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English  (originally in the sense 'dark or brownish grey'): from Old French bis 'dark grey', of unknown ultimate origin

encyclopedia.content: BICE，日本的创作型女歌手，原名为来岛优子。 也是很有才华的女作词家，曾为徐若瑄提供过歌曲，重要作品为日本超人气动画《轻音少女》中的一首活泼而有力的插曲《米饭是配菜》（曾获日本公信榜第三名），但在创作该词后不久便不幸病逝，年仅38岁。 相关介绍 「 K-ON!!」第20话的剧中曲「米饭是配菜」相信大家看完动画后还是有印象的。曲风是轻快但不失有力，听完后有种兴奋愉悦的感觉。其作/编曲者的信息也于20话开播当天公布，由

auth_sentence.content: I ran upstairs to say goodbye to Maja and call Bice.
auth_sentence.res_content: I ran upstairs to say goodbye to Maja and call Bice.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I ran upstairs to say goodbye to Maja and call Bice.

auth_sentence.content: But by the time we reached Maja, Bice seemed almost to have lost hope that she would ever get there.
auth_sentence.res_content: But by the time we reached Maja, Bice seemed almost to have lost hope that she would ever get there.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But by the time we reached Maja, Bice seemed almost to have lost hope that she would ever get there.

auth_sentence.content: Bice was assigned, for hers, a couch under a red-nosed portrait of Schopenhauer in the library-and-music room.
